mapper.update: update member set exp=exp+#{exp} where id=#{id}
update member set point=point+#{point} where id=#{id}
update member set point=point-#{point} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from daily_check where check_time > to_date(#{today},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and check_time < to_date(#{tomorrow},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update daily_check set check_time=sysdate where id=#{id}
